martyn.name: Martyn Charles
martyn.text: TECT@PARK !! Your guys are amazing. Today my site is live thanks to your effort.

Sundararajan.name: Sundararajan
Sundararajan.text: It is nice to see that the team is well trained and also have strong knowledge on technology.

Vijayakumar.name: Vijayakumar
Vijayakumar.text: Really bro, You are my life kickstarter.

Piyush.name: Piyush
Piyush.text: I am impressed with the effort that you guys are making.

Gunasekaran.name: Gunasekaran
Gunasekaran.text: Thanks na for what you did. Because of you i leaned technology and earned contacts.

Sureshkumar.name: Sureshkumar
Sureshkumar.text: Thanks Sathish na for this. Thanks would not be appropriate word for this help.

Marees.name: Marees
Marees.text: Before attending the training i had no idea about my future. Now i have a job because of you.

mani.name: Manikanta
mani.text: How lucky i m learning from you.Your are Special in my life
